Kalittokai 55.
itu “poṟiyiṉ yātta puṇarcci nōkki- yorumaik kēṇmaiyi ṉuṟukuṟai teḷintō - ḷarumai cāṉṟa nāliraṇṭu vakaiyiṟ - perumai cāṉṟa viyalpiṉkaṭ” (to.po.111) ṭalaivi kūṟiyatu. eṉṟatu, “orumaik kēṇmaiyiṉ uṟukuṟai - tāṉ avaḷeṉṉum vēṟṟumai-yillāta naṭpiṉālē tōḻi taṉakku vantu kūṟiya kuṟaiyai; poṟiyiṉ yātta puṇarcci nōkkit teḷintōḷ- muṉṉart teyvappuṇarcci nikaḻntamai nōkki atu kāraṇattāṉ muṭippatākat teḷinta talaivi; arumaicāṉṟa nāliraṇṭuvakaiyil - tāṉ muṉ arumaiyamaintu niṉṟanilaiyāṟ ṟalaivaṉ taṉkaṇ nikaḻttiya meytoṭṭup payiṟaṉ mutaliya eṭṭiṉālē; perumaicāṉṟa iyalpiṉ kaṇṇum - taṉakku uḷatām perumai kūṟutaṟku amaintatōr iyalpiṉ kaṇṇum; e-ṟu. itaṉāṟ pōnta poruḷ talaivaṉ ittuṇai iḷivantaṉa ceyyavum yāṉ nāṇum maṭaṉum nīṅkiṟṟilēṉeṉṟu taṉ perumai tōḻikkuk kūṟutalāyiṟṟu”.
miṉṉoḷi raviraṟa liṭaipōḻum peyalēpōṟ
poṉṉakai takaivakir vakaineṟi vayaṅkiṭṭup
pōḻiṭai yiṭṭa kamaḻnaṟum pūṅkōtai
yiṉṉakai yilaṅkeyiṟṟut tēmoḻit tuvarccevvāy
naṉṉutā ṉiṉakkoṉṟu kūṟuvāṅ kēḷiṉi;
nilleṉa niṟuttā ṉiṟuttē vantu
nutalu mukaṉun tōḷuṅ kaṇṇu
miyaluñ collu nōkkupu niṉaii
yaitēyn taṉṟu piṟaiyu maṉṟu
maitīrn taṉṟu matiyu maṉṟu
vēyamaṉ ṟaṉṟu malaiyu maṉṟu
pūvamaṉ ṟaṉṟu cuṉaiyu maṉṟu
mella viyalu mayilu maṉṟu
collat taḷaruṅ kiḷiyu maṉṟu;
eṉavāṅku,
aṉaiyaṉa palapā rāṭṭip paiyeṉa
valaiyar pōlac cōrpata ṉoṟṟiyeṉ
ṉeñcu nekiḻnta cevvi kāṇūup
pulaiyar pōlap puṉka ṇōkkit
toḻalun toḻutāṉ ṟoṭalun toṭṭāṉ
kāḻvarai nillāk kaṭuṅkaḷi ṟaṉṉōṉ
ṟoḻūun toṭūumavaṉ ṟaṉmai
yēḻait taṉmaiyō villai tōḻi.
